snippet: The wearable computing wars are about to begin, a report released Tuesday by Forrester Research says, predicting that Apple, Google, Microsoft, Amazon and Facebook will help usher in the new era of computing.
abstract: The wearable computing wars are about to begin, a report released Tuesday by Forrester Research says, predicting that Apple, Google, Microsoft, Amazon and Facebook will help usher in the new era of computing.

headline.main: Wearable Computers Are the Next Big Devices, Report Says
